title: Tomate Verde Restaurante Vegetariano
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Colombian, Latin American
description: Vegetarian restaurant serving breakfast and lunch. Lunch includes soup, main dish and juice for a set price. Has a couple of vegan items and can make something else vegan for you. Also sells in-house-made pesto, jam, and German bread. The owner is vegetarian from Germany.
